name: Singularity (itch) (Meaty Okra Games)
description:
Asymmetrical battle between multiple newly conscious robots trying to repair their ship to colonize a new planet, and their evil creator trying to thwart them at every turn. Robots must work together quickly to repair things around the ship from a single isometric camera. Meanwhile, their creator is in first-person, armed with a hammer, smashes everything in sight. The robots have numbers, but they must also contend with the first rule of robotics, they can do no harm to humans, and instead must employ creative distractions and ploys to slow the demented creator down.

made for Global Game Jam 2020

Created by: Sam Morris, Raphael Estrada, Michael Probst, and Caleb Geyer. 

Music by Miles Campbell.
